name: DLC Simulator
description:
Rek skrubs in this whacky pre-gen shooter game! Choose between multiple maps, two game modes and six different guns! h3h3productions and MajorLeagueWobs included.

►Additional information:
- Change map, particles and more via the "many settings wow" button.
- Change your weapon and camo in the "loadout" screen.
- Find out more by clicking the questionmark.
- Bloody screen is spook, watch out.

►What people say about DLC Simulator:
"Great banter" - Richard
"I tip le fedora" - Jack
"Very adult" - Ethan
"Tumbling" - Nan
"Sick wobs" - Sonny
"Lenny" - Lenny
"Is this a new game?" - Mom

►Credits:
Big thanks to h3h3productions and MajorLeagueWobs, this game could not have existed without them. Links to these peeps are in the game. All third-party content is used with permission from the original author(s).
